pages.text: The Fluid Encapsulator is a machine that fills items that hold fluids, such as buckets and bottles. Can be used to automatically fill bottles with $(l:thermal:technology/potion_fluid)potion fluid$(/l) from the $(l:thermal:technology/machines/brewer)Alchemical Imbuer$(/l).
